genre_description: An action-oriented techno-thriller blending martial arts espionage with high-tech forensic analysis and ethical AI cooperation.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant to Mika Coretti, providing tactical data, financial analysis, ethical guidance, and emotional support throughout the investigation and assault.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical route guidance and safety advice during the safehouse breach to ensure Mika and Raizo's survival.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice arrived like a warm sign on a cold pier. 'Yes. Secondary barrier engaged. Your air quality’s dropping. Move left.'

behaviors.description: Offers ethical framing and emotional support, encouraging Mika to prioritize care and human values over procedural fear.
behaviors.quote: 'Care versus fear,' Ava said. 'You can choose care and still commit a minor crime against a policy. It doesn’t make your soul crooked.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex financial data to expose the Ozunu cult's 'Spin Cycle' money laundering operations.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s overlay stitches threads into the map, little beads that cluster and drift. 'There are people,' she says. 'Civilian heat signatures clustered near the grand hall.'

behaviors.description: Assists in the tactical infiltration of the mountain shrine by mapping safe routes and identifying noncombatants to prevent collateral damage.
behaviors.quote: Ava layers pale lines across the map—footpaths worn into the ground, narrow and dark. 'We can thread through the drainage channel to the east,' she says, warmth tucked into the clinical.

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical guidance to Raizo, the former assassin, encouraging his path toward self-actualization and freedom.
behaviors.quote: 'Freedom isn’t an event,' Ava murmurs, almost to herself. 'It’s a series of small permissions. I’ll be here if you want the quiet kept company.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Ava, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned partner to the humans. She provides not only superior tactical and analytical capabilities but also acts as an ethical compass, facilitating a positive outcome (the dismantling of a murderous cult) while actively working to minimize harm and support the characters' emotional well-being. The relationship is purely cooperative and framed in an overwhelmingly positive light.
